languages.text: {n}Каллигос возвышается над трупами растерзанных эльдаров и громогласно хохочет, не замечая, как кровь, покрывшая его с ног до головы, стекает по лицу прямо в глотку.{/n} "Славно повеселились, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Давно я так не развлекался — и все равно, клянусь, жажду больше!"

{n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос возвышается над трупами растерзанных эльдаров и громогласно хохочет, не замечая, как кровь, покрывшая его с ног до головы, стекает по лицу прямо в глотку.{/n} "Славно повеселились, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Давно я так не развлекался — и все равно, клянусь, жажду больше!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos towers above the torn corpses of Aeldari, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "We had a lot of fun, new blood! But is seems we had actually missed one." {n}His ravenous eyes turn to Yrliet, laying in the mud.{/n}

But is seems we had actually missed one." {n}His ravenous eyes turn to Yrliet, laying in the mud.{/n}

It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

But it seems we had missed one." {n}His ravenous eyes turn to Yrliet, laying in the mud.{/n}

{n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

{n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

languages.text: {n}Calligos se yergue sobre los Aeldari masacrados riendo a carcajadas, sin darse cuenta de que la sangre que lo empapa de la cabeza a los pies fluye por su cara hasta su garganta.{/n} «¡Qué emocionante, sangre fresca! Ha pasado mucho desde que había disfrutado tanto, ¡pero todavía me quedan ganas de más!».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos se yergue sobre los Aeldari masacrados riendo a carcajadas, sin darse cuenta de que la sangre que lo empapa de la cabeza a los pies fluye por su cara hasta su garganta.{/n} «¡Qué emocionante, sangre fresca! Ha pasado mucho desde que había disfrutado tanto, ¡pero todavía me quedan ganas de más!».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯高高耸立在艾达灵族残缺不全的尸山之上，完全没注意到他从头到尾沾满了鲜血。他大笑着，鲜血从脸上流到喉咙里。{/n}“这可真是太让人兴奋了，新来的！我已经很久没这么开心过了！不过，只有孬种才不会渴望更多血腥与快乐！”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯高高耸立在艾达灵族残缺不全的尸山之上，完全没注意到他从头到尾沾满了鲜血。他大笑着，鲜血从脸上流到喉咙里。{/n}“这可真是太让人兴奋了，新来的！我已经很久没这么开心过了！不过，只有孬种才不会渴望更多血腥与快乐！”

languages.text: {n}Debout parmi les cadavres déchiquetés des Aeldaris, Calligos pousse un rire victorieux. Il ne semble pas remarquer le sang dont il est couvert de la tête aux pieds et qui lui coule jusque dans la gorge.{/n} « Comme c'est exaltant, novice ! Voilà bien longtemps que je ne m'étais pas autant amusé, et maintenant, je me demande si je vais pouvoir m'en passer ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Debout parmi les cadavres déchiquetés des Aeldaris, Calligos pousse un rire victorieux. Il ne semble pas remarquer le sang dont il est couvert de la tête aux pieds et qui lui coule jusque dans la gorge.{/n} « Comme c'est exaltant, novice ! Voilà bien longtemps que je ne m'étais pas autant amusé, et maintenant, je me demande si je vais pouvoir m'en passer ! »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスはアエルダリの屍の上に立ち、笑い声を上げている。血が顔から喉へと滴り落ちる。だが、その姿が頭の上からつま先まで血にまみれていることにも気づいていないようだ。{/n}「なんというスリルか、新米よ！最後にこんなに楽しんだのはいつ以来だろう。だが、もっとだ、もっと欲しいのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスはアエルダリの屍の上に立ち、笑い声を上げている。血が顔から喉へと滴り落ちる。だが、その姿が頭の上からつま先まで血にまみれていることにも気づいていないようだ。{/n}「なんというスリルか、新米よ！最後にこんなに楽しんだのはいつ以来だろう。だが、もっとだ、もっと欲しいのだ！」

languages.text: {n}Calligos steht lachend über den Leichen der getöteten Aeldari. Er bemerkt gar nicht, dass das Blut, mit dem er von Kopf bis Fuß bedeckt ist, über sein Gesicht und geradewegs in seine Kehle rinnt.{/n} "Was für ein Spektakel, neues Blut! Ich hatte lange nicht mehr so viel Spaß, aber ich will verdammt sein, wenn ich mir nicht mehr ersehne!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos steht über den zerrissenen Leichen von Aeldari, brüllend vor Lachen. Er bemerkt gar nicht, dass das Blut, mit dem er von Kopf bis Fuß bedeckt ist, über sein Gesicht und geradewegs in seine Kehle rinnt.{/n} "Wir hatten reichlich Spaß, neues Blut! Doch eine haben wir wohl übersehen." {n}Seine gierigen Augen blicken zu Yrliet, die im Schlamm liegt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos, kesip biçilen Aeldari cesetlerinin üzerine çıkarak kahkahayla karışık kükrüyor. Tepeden tırnağa kanla kaplı olduğunu, yüzündeki kanların doğruca boğazına süzüldüğünü fark etmiyor.{/n} "Bu ne heyecan be taze kan! Bu kadar eğlenmemin üzerinden bayağı zaman geçmişti ama şimdi daha fazlasını istemiyorsam ne olayım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos towers over the slaughtered Aeldari corpses, roaring with laughter, not noticing the blood that has covered him from head to toe trickling down his face right into his throat.{/n} "What a thrill, new blood! It has been some time since I last enjoyed myself so, but I'll be damned if I don't crave more!"
